recipesJson.name: Banana Grandma
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description:
Mixed Live on SaturDIY'ing with Fresh & Friends. 

Set out to make a Phillies/White Owl Banana Blunt. This is not that. After version 1 came out tasting like eating a banana marshmallow in a tobacco shop, I whipped up this remix with help from Fresh and his chat. It came out too good for a bottom shelf blunt. This is a top-shelf banana cigar. It's the Banana [Abuela](https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/47894#abuela_by_fear). 

Edit: Additional notes posted on Reddit here: https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/awdipl/march_2019_recipe_thread/ei5wbe9/

reviews.text: Solid recipe little forward on the banana it is mostly all i get on the inhale and the first part of the exhale then i get nice smoky tobacco. I also steeped for 7 days before so tobacco may come in more over time. Either way it is delicious excellent job man.
